pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gaussian Process Modeling of Multi-Response Datasets // Provides a general and efficient tool for fitting a response surface to datasets via Gaussian processes. The dataset can have multiple responses. The package is based on the work of Bostanabad, R., Kearney, T., Tao, S., Apley, D. W. Chen, W. Leveraging the nugget parameter for efficient Gaussian process modeling (2017) doi:10.1002/nme.5751.
